briefTitle: A Safety Study of Pimavanserin in Adult and Elderly Subjects Experiencing Neuropsychiatric Symptoms Related to Neurodegenerative Disease
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Safety Study of Pimavanserin Therapy in Adult and Elderly Subjects Experiencing Neuropsychiatric Symptoms Related to Neurodegenerative Disease
conditions: Neuropsychiatric Symptoms Related to Neurodegenerative Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of pimavanserin compared to placebo in adult and elderly subjects with neuropsychiatric symptoms related to neurodegenerative disease.
